   20: 
   21: 
   22: -module(trace_port_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   25:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   26:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   27:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   28: 
   29: -export([call_trace/1,
   30: 	 return_trace/1,
   31: 	 send/1,
   32: 	 receive_trace/1,
   33: 	 receive_trace_non_scheduler/1,
   34: 	 process_events/1,
   35: 	 schedule/1,
   36: 	 gc/1,
   37: 	 default_tracer/1,
   38: 	 tracer_port_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: %% Needed for apply
   41: -export([erlang_trace/3, erlang_trace_info/2, erlang_trace_pattern/3]).
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   48:      {timetrap, {seconds, 20}}]. %{minutes, 2}}].
   49: 
   50: all() ->
   51:     trace_sessions:all().
   52: 
   53: groups() ->
   54:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   55: 
   56: testcases() ->
   57:     [call_trace, return_trace, send, receive_trace,
   58:      receive_trace_non_scheduler,
   59:      process_events, schedule, gc,
   60:      default_tracer, tracer_port_crash].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   69:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   72:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   73: 
   74: 
   75: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   76:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   79:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
   80: 
   81: 
   82: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
   83:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
   84: 
   85: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
   86:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
   87: 
   88: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
   89:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
   90: 
   91: 
   92: 
   93: %% Test sending call trace messages to a port.
   94: call_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     start_tracer(Config),
   96:     Self = self(),
   97:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
   98:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
   99:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  100:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
  101:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
  102:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[[a,b]]}}),
  103: 
  104:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
  105:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  106:     Huge = huge_data(),
  107:     lists:reverse(Huge),
  108:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[Huge]},ts}),
  109: 
  110:     trace_pid(Self, true, [arity]),
  111:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  112:     [y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y]),
  113:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1},ts}),
  114: 
  115:     trace_pid(Self, false, [timestamp]),
  116:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  117:     [z,y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y,z]),
  118:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1}}),
  119: 
  120:     %% OTP-7399. Delayed sub-binary creation optimization.
  121:     trace_pid(Self, false, [arity]),
  122:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  123:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, [], [local]),
  124:     26 = bs_sum_c(<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0),
  125:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, false, [local]),
  126:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>,0]}}),
  127:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<5:4,7:4,11:4>>,3]}}),
  128:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<7:4,11:4>>,8]}}),
  129:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<11:4>>,15]}}),
  130:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<>>,26]}}),
  131: 
  132:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, false),
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: bs_sum_c(<<H:4,T/bits>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_c(T, H+Acc);
  136: bs_sum_c(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  137: 
  138: 
  139: %% Test the new return trace.
  140: return_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  141:     start_tracer(Config),
  142:     Self = self(),
  143:     MFA = {lists,reverse,1},
  144: 
  145:     %% Plain (no timestamp, small data).
  146: 
  147:     trace_func(MFA, [{['$1'],[],[{return_trace},
  148:                                  {message,false}]}]),
  149:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
  150:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  151:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
  152:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  153:     {traced,global} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  154:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
  155:     expect({trace,Self,return_from,MFA,[b,a]}),
  156: 
  157:     %% Timestamp, huge data.
  158:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
  159:     Result = lists:reverse(huge_data()),
  160:     expect({trace_ts,Self,return_from,MFA,Result,ts}),
  161: 
  162:     %% Turn off trace.
  163:     trace_func(MFA, false),
  164:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  165:     {traced,false} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: %% Test sending send trace messages to a port.
  169: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  171:     Self = self(),
  172:     Sender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  173:     trac(Sender, true, [send]),
  174: 
  175:     %% Simple message, no timestamp.
  176: 
  177:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 10)),
  178:     Msg = {some_data,Bin},
  179:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),Msg},
  180:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  181:     expect({trace,Sender,send,Msg,Self}),
  182: 
  183:     %% Timestamp.
  184: 
  185:     BiggerMsg = {even_bigger,Msg},
  186:     trac(Sender, true, [send,timestamp]),
  187:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),BiggerMsg},
  188:     receive BiggerMsg -> ok end,
  189:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,BiggerMsg,Self,ts}),
  190: 
  191:     %% Huge message.
  192: 
  193:     HugeMsg = huge_data(),
  194:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),HugeMsg},
  195:     receive HugeMsg -> ok end,
  196:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,HugeMsg,Self,ts}),
  197: 
  198:     %% Kill trace port and force a trace.  The emulator should not crasch.
  199: 
  200:     unlink(Tracer),
  201:     exit(Tracer, kill),
  202:     erlang:yield(),				% Make sure that port gets killed.
  203:     Sender ! {send_please,Self,good_bye},
  204:     receive good_bye -> ok end,
  205:     ok.
  206: 
  207: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  208: receive_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     start_tracer(Config),
  210:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  211:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  212: 
  213:     Receiver ! {hello,world},
  214:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{hello,world}}),
  215: 
  216:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive',timestamp]),
  217:     Huge = {hello,huge_data()},
  218:     Receiver ! {hello,huge_data()},
  219:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,'receive',Huge,ts}),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  223: receive_trace_non_scheduler(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  224:     start_tracer(Config),
  225:     S = self(),
  226:     Receiver = spawn_link(
  227:                  fun() ->
  228:                          receive
  229:                              go ->
  230:                                  Ref = S ! erlang:trace_delivered(all),
  231:                                  receive {trace_delivered, Ref, all} -> ok end
  232:                          end
  233:                  end),
  234:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  235:     Receiver ! go,
  236:     Ref = receive R -> R end,
  237:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',go}),
  238:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{trace_delivered, all, Ref}}),
  239: 
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: %% Tests a few process events (like getting linked).
  243: process_events(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     start_tracer(Config),
  245:     Self = self(),
  246:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  247:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs]),
  248: 
  249:     unlink(Receiver),				%It is already linked.
  250:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self}),
  251:     link(Receiver),
  252:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_linked,Self}),
  253:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs,timestamp]),
  254:     unlink(Receiver),
  255:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  256:     link(Receiver),
  257:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_linked,Self,ts}),
  258: 
  259:     unlink(Receiver),
  260:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  261:     Huge = huge_data(),
  262:     exit(Receiver, Huge),
  263:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,exit,Huge,ts}),
  264: 
  265:     ok.
  266: 
  267: %% Test sending scheduling events to a port.
  268: schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  269:     start_tracer(Config),
  270:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  271:     trac(Receiver, true, [running]),
  272: 
  273:     Receiver ! hi,
  274:     expect({trace,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  275:     expect({trace,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  276: 
  277:     trac(Receiver, true, [running,timestamp]),
  278: 
  279:     Receiver ! hi_again,
  280:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  281:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  282: 
  283:     ok.
  284: 
  285: %% Test sending garbage collection events to a port.
  286: gc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  287:     start_tracer(Config),
  288:     Garber = fun_spawn(fun garber/0, [{min_heap_size, 5000}]),
  289:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection]),
  290:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  291: 
  292:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  293:     Garber ! hi,
  294:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_start,info}),
  295:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_end,info}),
  296: 
  297:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection,timestamp]),
  298:     Garber ! hi,
  299:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_start,info,ts}),
  300:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_end,info,ts}),
  301: 
  302:     ok.
  303: 
  304: %% Test a port as default tracer.
  305: default_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  306:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  307:     TracerMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, Tracer),
  308:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  309:     %%
  310:     N = erlang_trace(all, true, [send, {tracer, Port}]),
  311:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  312:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  313:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
  314:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
  315:     G1 = fun_spawn(fun general/0),
  316:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(G1, flags),
  317:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(G1, tracer),
  318:     unlink(Tracer),
  319:     exit(Port, done),
  320:     done = receive
  321:                {'DOWN', TracerMonitor, process, Tracer, TracerExitReason} ->
  322:                    TracerExitReason
  323:            end,
  324:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  325:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  326:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
  327:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
  328:     M = erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  329:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  330:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  331:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(G1, flags),
  332:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(G1, tracer),
  333:     G1 ! {apply,{erlang,exit,[normal]}},
  334:     io:format("~p = ~p.~n", [M, N]),
  335:     M = N - 1, % G1 has been started, but Tracer and Port have died
  336:     ok.
  337: 
  338: tracer_port_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  339:     Tr = start_tracer(Config),
  340:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  341:     Tracee = spawn(fun () ->
  342:                            register(trace_port_linker, self()),
  343:                            link(Port),
  344:                            receive go -> ok end,
  345:                            lists:reverse([1,b,c]),
  346:                            receive die -> ok end
  347:                    end),
  348:     Tr ! {unlink_tracer_port, self()},
  349:     receive {unlinked_tracer_port, Tr} -> ok end,
  350:     port_control(Port, $c, []), %Make port commands crash tracer port...
  351:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
  352:     trace_pid(Tracee, true, [call]),
  353:     trace_info(Tracee, flags),
  354:     trace_info(self(), tracer),
  355:     Tracee ! go,
  356:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  357:     case whereis(trace_port_linker) of
  358:         undefined ->
  359:             ok;
  360:         Id ->
  361:             ct:fail({trace_port_linker, Id})
  362:     end,
  363:     undefined = process_info(Tracee),
  364:     ok.
  365: 
  366: %%% Help functions.
  367: 
  368: huge_data() -> huge_data(16384).
  369: huge_data(0) -> [];
  370: huge_data(N) when N rem 2 == 0 ->
  371:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  372:     [P|P];
  373: huge_data(N) ->
  374:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  375:     [16#1234566,P|P].
  376: 
  377: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,info,ts}=Message) ->
  378:     receive
  379:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,_Info,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  380:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  381:             MessageTs;
  382:         Other ->
  383:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  384:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  385:     after 5000 ->
  386:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  387:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  388:     end;
  389: expect({trace,E1,E2,info}=Message) ->
  390:     receive
  391:         {trace,E1,E2,_Info}=MessageTs ->
  392:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  393:             MessageTs;
  394:         Other ->
  395:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  396:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  397:     after 5000 ->
  398:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  399:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  400:     end;
  401: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,ts}=Message) ->
  402:     receive
  403:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  404:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  405:             MessageTs;
  406:         Other ->
  407:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  408:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  409:     after 5000 ->
  410:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  411:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  412:     end;
  413: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,ts}=Message) ->
  414:     receive
  415:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  416:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  417:             MessageTs;
  418:         Other ->
  419:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  420:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  421:     after 5000 ->
  422:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  423:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  424:     end;
  425: expect(Message) ->
  426:     receive
  427:         Message ->
  428:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [Message]),
  429:             Message;
  430:         Other ->
  431:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  432:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  433:     after 5000 ->
  434:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  435:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  436:     end.
  437: 
  438: trac(What, On, Flags0) ->
  439:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  440:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace,[What,On,Flags]}},
  441:     Res = receive
  442:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  443:           end,
  444:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  445:                    [What,On,Flags,Res]),
  446:     Res.
  447: 
  448: trace_info(What, Key) ->
  449:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_info,[What,Key]}},
  450:     Res = receive
  451:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  452:           end,
  453:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_info(~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  454:                    [What,Key,Res]),
  455:     Res.
  456: 
  457: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg) ->
  458:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg,[]]}},
  459:     Res = receive
  460:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  461:           end,
  462:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  463:     Res.
  464: 
  465: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg, Flags) ->
  466:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg,Flags]}},
  467:     Res = receive
  468:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  469:           end,
  470:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  471:     Res.
  472: 
  473: trace_pid(Pid, On, Flags0) ->
  474:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  475:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace,[Pid,On,Flags]}},
  476:     Res = receive
  477:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  478:           end,
  479:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  480:                    [Pid,On,Flags,Res]),
  481:     Res.
  482: 
  483: start_tracer(Config) ->
  484:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  485:     ok = load_driver(Path, echo_drv),
  486:     Self = self(),
  487:     put(tracer, fun_spawn(fun() -> tracer(Self) end)),
  488:     receive
  489:         {started,Port} ->
  490:             put(tracer_port, Port)
  491:     end,
  492:     get(tracer).
  493: 
  494: load_driver(Dir, Driver) ->
  495:     case erl_ddll:load_driver(Dir, Driver) of
  496:         ok -> ok;
  497:         {error, Error} = Res ->
  498:             io:format("~s\n", [erl_ddll:format_error(Error)]),
  499:             Res
  500:     end.
  501: 
  502: tracer(RelayTo) ->
  503:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv}, [eof,binary]),
  504:     RelayTo ! {started,Port},
  505:     tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port).
  506: 
  507: tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port) ->
  508:     receive
  509:         {apply,From,{M,F,A}} ->
  510:             From ! {apply_result,apply(M, F, A)},
  511:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  512:         {Port,{data,Msg}} ->
  513:             RelayTo ! binary_to_term(Msg),
  514:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  515:         {unlink_tracer_port, From} ->
  516:             unlink(Port),
  517:             From ! {unlinked_tracer_port, self()},
  518:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  519:         Other ->
  520:             exit({bad_message,Other})
  521:     end.
  522: 
  523: fun_spawn(Fun) ->
  524:     spawn_link(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
  525: 
  526: fun_spawn(Fun, Opts) ->
  527:     spawn_opt(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]], [link | Opts]).
  528: 
  529: % flush() ->
  530: %     receive
  531: % 	X ->
  532: % 	    [X | flush()]
  533: %     after 2000 ->
  534: % 	    []
  535: %     end.
  536: 
  537: 
  538: %%% Models for various kinds of processes.
  539: 
  540: %% Sends messages when ordered to.
  541: 
  542: sender() ->
  543:     receive
  544:         {send_please, To, What} ->
  545:             To ! What,
  546:             sender()
  547:     end.
  548: 
  549: %% Just consumes messages from its message queue.
  550: 
  551: receiver() ->
  552:     receive
  553:         _Any -> receiver()
  554:     end.
  555: 
  556: %% Does a garbage collection when it receives a message.
  557: 
  558: garber() ->
  559:     receive
  560:         _Any ->
  561:             lists:seq(1, 100),
  562:             erlang:garbage_collect(),
  563:             garber()
  564:     end.
  565: 
  566: %% All-purpose process
  567: 
  568: general() ->
  569:     receive
  570:         {apply, {M, F, Args}} ->
  571:             erlang:apply(M, F, Args),
  572:             general();
  573:         {send, Dest, Msg} ->
  574:             Dest ! Msg,
  575:             general();
  576:         {call_f_1, Arg} ->
  577:             f(Arg),
  578:             general();
  579:         nop ->
  580:             general()
  581:     end.
  582: 
  583: f(Arg) ->
  584:     Arg.
